Name.question: What is the name of the dataset?

Subsets.question: What are the dialect subsets of this dataset? The keys are 'Name', 'Volume', 'Unit', 'Dialect'. 'Dialect' must be one of the country name from the dialect options

Link.question: What is the link to access the dataset? The link must contain the dataset. If the dataset is hosted on HuggingFace, use the HF Link.

HF Link.question: What is the Huggingface link of the dataset?

License.question: What is the license of the dataset?
options: Non Commercial Use - ELRA END USER

Year.question: What year was the dataset published?

Language.question: What languages are in the dataset?

option_description.ar: the dataset is purely in Arabic, there are no other languages involved
option_description.multilingual: the dataset contains samples in other languages

Dialect.question: What is the dialect of the dataset?

option_description.mixed: the dataset contains samples in multiple dialects i.e. social media. Assume Modern Standard Arabic if not specified.

Domain.question: What is the domain of the dataset?

Form.question: What is the form of the data?

option_description.crawling: the dataset was collected by crawling the web
option_description.human annotation: the dataset was labelled by human annotators
option_description.machine annotation: the dataset was collected/labelled by machine programs
option_description.manual curation: the dataset was collected manually by human curators
option_description.LLM generated: the dataset was generated by an LLM
option_description.other: the dataset was collected in a different way

Description.question: Write a brief description about the dataset in less than 50 words

Volume.question: What is the size of the dataset? Output numbers only with ',' separating each thousand. If the dataset is multilingual only use the size of the Arabic dataset

Unit.question: What kind of examples does the dataset include?

option_description.sentences: the samples are sentences or short paragraphs
option_description.documents: the samples are long documents i.e. web pages or books

Ethical Risks.question: What is the level of the ethical risks of the dataset?

option_description.Low: most likely no ethical risks associated with this dataset
option_description.High: hate/offensive datasets from social media, or web pages

Provider.question: What entity is the provider of the dataset? Don't use Team.

Derived From.question: What datasets were used to create the dataset?

Paper Title.question: What is the title of the paper?

Paper Link.question: What is the link to the paper?

Script.question: What is the script of this dataset?

option_description.Arab: The script used is only in Arabic
option_description.Latin: The script used is only in Latin i.e. it has samples written in Latin like Arabizi or transliteration
option_description.Arab-Latin: The script used is a mix of Arabic and Latin

option_description.Yes: The dataset is tokenized. Tokenized means the words are split using a morphological analyzer

Host.question: What is name of the repository that hosts the dataset?

Access.question: What is the accessibility of the dataset?

option_description.Free: the dataset is public and free to access
option_description.Upon-Request: the dataset is free to access but requires a submitting a request or filling out a form
option_description.With-Fee: the dataset is not free to access

Cost.question: If the dataset is not free, what is the cost?

Test Split.question: Does the dataset contain a train/valid and test split?

option_description.Yes: The dataset contains a train/valid and test split
option_description.No: The dataset does not contain a train/valid or test split

Tasks.question: What are the tasks that this dataset can be used for?

Venue Title.question: What is the venue title of the published paper?

Citations.question: Guess the citations count of the paper

Venue Name.question: What is the full name of the venue that published the paper?

Authors.question: Who are the authors of the paper? The max list of authors should be 5, if there are more use et al.

Affiliations.question: What are the affiliations of the authors?

Abstract.question: What is the abstract of the paper? Remove any \ or " from the abstract.
